title: Out of mind
author: Out of mind
content: Present, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PM Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?I really think that Bitcoin will grow more and even reach ATH price since there’s nothing to stop them now because we are all get over to FTX and other big crypto companies that got bankrupt. The only way this current trend will stop is when Bitcoin ETF is denied or when one of the institutional investors such as microstrategy will finally take profit since they are the only entity that has the ability to dump the market using their current holdings but I doubt this will happened soon because they are still accumulating even on the current price which means they are thinking long term.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?There are many currencies that have been showing interest in coming along way far as bitcoin had been but yet they can't withstand the relevance of what bitcoin has always served, in terms of performance, there are alot of them thst have a market price performance in recent times better than bitcoin but they are not reliable and cannot be trusted the way bitcoin had always been, we know this truth for the sake of the experience crypto users that bitcoin is the only most reliable digital currency, which also have proven years of consistencies and trust.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: If you compare bitcoin and altcoins, it is clear that bitcoin is much faster than altcoins, for other coins they follow the upward trend of bitcoin and then can enter bearish, most altcoins will find it difficult to survive, it will fall even more to the bottom of this which we often see in the market.It seems that the upward trend of bitcoin is still continuing now stuck in the $44,000 area there is definitely a possibility before the end of the year ends bitcoin could be at $50,000 this is actually not certain but anything can happen if you look at the market conditions that are quite bullish now.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?Am not favoring altcoin in this post but if we will check the market graph it shows that there are even more altcoins that grows higher or even faster against bitcoin though many of them are just Memecoins, shitcoins and some are even Pump and dump coins so yeah your post shows legit way of being Growing and that is Bitcoin.So yes as well to bitcoin will be hitting 45k in the next couple of days and about 50k breaking? you know that majority of bitcointalk Users are longing for that though the Transaction fees once again is shocking , climbing 160+ satoshi /vB and that is the highest i have seen this year alone not even higher from the past bullrun that i witnessed.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMAt present, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead, it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see the Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?Bitcoin party just started and I can assure you that,  we will be having a lot of exciting experience as the market keep growing and that can help a lot even though it seems that at that point it will become very expensive for those who just got in at fresh,  but then Bitcoin is a journey that requires a lot of patience and long term experience,  but in general bitcoin is an exciting investment journey that gives us the double gains of having to build knowledge around it and also make some visible profits along the line. So not right for us to categorize Bitcoin in the class of other cryptocurrencies since Bitcoin is the primary coin and also the king of the industry,  all other altcoins are just in for short-term speculation and hypes,  many times we have to look at some obvious fact about Bitcoin before we associate it to other crypto.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: Bitcoin is the most reliable out of all the crypto currencies and the coins which has pumped but, it's not the one with highest gainers as there are dozens of altcoins which ahs grown massively during last few weeks and they are a mix of shit coins, meme coins and also some genuine altcoins as well but, some of them have already started to fall apart but that's not the case with Bitcoin as Bitcoin continues to rally. It will imminently reach $50000 or even further and possible to see ATH and if there are no correction phase then the most awaited figure of $100k will not be a distant milestone to achieve.

comments.author: Lanatsa
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?If you are really just that new into this market then these kind of sentiments are really just normal or not really that shocking because these words are actually came from into those noobs or who doesnt really have much experience into this market because if you do then you would definitely say the different thing instead. We do know that Bitcoin is the main coin into this market and whenever it do makes some pump then you would notice that most coins in the market would turn out to be green, although the percentage gains wont really be that much high but on the time that you do see that Bitcoins price is consolidation then you would really be able to notice that altcoins prices do really pump out. Why? because we do really have that so called "Altcoin season". You would really be able to experience for yourself if you haventable to do so.This market does have those kind of cycles on which not all the time it would really be focusing on Bitcoin alone but there comes a time that there would really bethose altcoin ones. For now that Bitcoin halving is going near then this kind of market movement isnt really that shocking honestly.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?Of course, it's the first crypto currency, and so everyone is attached to it, then it become an enigma because as I have said, the prime mover, and then it's creator suddenly went underground and no one heard from him since his disappearance which added the mystery to his creation.And then as we go on the journey, people find ways to trade it and then we have a reach history about exchanges, from Mt. Gox to the current one. And then the first purchase of Pizza, crypto gambling and others.As for the price, yeah, why not? $50k is just around the corner this year. The market is very positive up to this point because of so many good news like approval of Bitcoin Spot ETF and then the block halving next year.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?Bitcoin is the top coin and very dominant, that's why the focus of the investors right now are with Bitcoin but don't worry because for sure altcoins will follow.The target price for this year is around $50k and we are near to that price, if there's a lot of good news and fresh money coming in the market, for sure we can easily break the resistance and hit the peak price for this year. We are already in the bullish trend, we should be more confident about the price of Bitcoin, and look forward for a more peak price.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: When you talk about a coin’s growth I wish people would refer to market cap instead of coin price. It shows an understanding of what is being discussed. Also, considering most other coins have presales or other methods of enriching their founders, Bitcoin’s growth can’t be touched, as it’s infinite from where it started, which was 0.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on December 06, 2023, 09:41:45 PMWhen you talk about a coin’s growth I wish people would refer to market cap instead of coin price. It shows an understanding of what is being discussed. Also, considering most other coins have presales or other methods of enriching their founders, Bitcoin’s growth can’t be touched, as it’s infinite from where it started, which was 0. Bitcoin's market capitalization growth is even faster compared to other stocks that first appeared. It only took 12 years for Bitcoin to reach the $1 Trillion Market cap and prove that Bitcoin's growth is faster compared to Google, Apple, Amazon and Microsoft stocks.Even today in Real-time, Bitcoin Market cap $856.25 B which overtakes 3 companies at once Meta (Facebook), Berkshire Hathaway and Tesla. in the last 7 days, Bitcoin's Market cap is up 15.81% and is in 9th place with the largest market cap.https://8marketcap.com/

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?This is expected.We've got several factors looking at, halving, bitcoin etfs, institutional money is coming back together with the retailers, etc. That's going to make the demand higher again and this is typical when we're going to the bull run. Everyone starts to understand the cycle now that we're in and that's why everything is possible, could even be higher than $51k but could just be stuck to $44k until eoy.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: This is the power of Bitcoin dominance. A lot of people say that "if you invest in Bitcoin, you will get low ROI".But now, take a look, their altcoins are not even following Bitcoin or not even pumping. And if Bitcoin pumps, they don't pump, if Bitcoin will dump, some altcoins are dumping also.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: Bitcoin is far different and not to be even compared with any other cryptocurrency as it is clear the  superiority it has, which others are trying to reach but all to no avail. Many Altcoins have pumped a lot even when Bitcoin was down, they keep claiming and comparing themselves, sometimes I see them make stickers were they downgrade Bitcoin and make their currency look like it is the best out their meanwhile they go behind and pump the market so as many will invest and you see them at the very end dump and rug the project.Let those who trust Bitcoin, watch end enjoy what it has for us, do we continue having an uptrend in the price let the market keep flowing in it's direction but I believe without any form of doubt we should expect Bitcoin at a range we're we do not expect just the way it has moved in the past days as no one ever imagined it to happen so fast.

comments.author: naikturun
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?I think the way it works is like that, when bitcoin is about to rise, all money flows will go there. As a result, bitcoin will rise first while altcoins are silent and left behind, but after rising bitcoin will break for a moment, that's where the new altcoins will rise because money alternately flows into altcoins.and according to my predictions the cycle will always be like that.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?One thing about me is that I do not like to deviate from the fact, but you just did, maybe you do not know, there are many altcoins that have grown exponentially. Some had grown over x10 in this bull run, so I do not know where you see it only in Bitcoin which has not grown x2 in the recent bull run. I have my sizable amount of money in Bitcoin and the same goes for the altcoins, so it's so easy to know what is happening within my wallets without any sentiments.That said, Bitcoin is a very good coin and will continue to grow for the next 1+ years. This is already known before now which is why people are pumping and pumping it especially this time that the FOMO is all over the place. I didn't know it could reach $40,000 this year, but it hit it effortlessly, so reaching $50,000 cannot be an issue anymore. Bitcoin has moved so well in recent days and has peaked at $44,500+ this year.For this, I do not think that anything can stop it from buying further as people have now continued to see it as a good investment opportunity so they will continue to pump it till next year.

comments.author: bestcoins1
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?After increasing and passing $44K, today Bitcoin also corrected slightly in the market, although only for a fairly short period of time. I think the potential for it to continue to increase again is still there and will continue to happen this month, while for altcoins I think at the moment there are not more people who want to think about it and want to buy more of them. Because the focus of many people now is on Bitcoin, not on altcoins, don't be surprised if you see altcoins not increasing significantly during this time.Quote from: naikturun on December 07, 2023, 10:13:18 AMI think the way it works is like that, when bitcoin is about to rise, all money flows will go there. As a result, bitcoin will rise first while altcoins are silent and left behind, but after rising bitcoin will break for a moment, that's where the new altcoins will rise because money alternately flows into altcoins.and according to my predictions the cycle will always be like that.The flow of more money into Bitcoin in the last two months is quite normal because news about price improvements is always more focused on Bitcoin, not on altcoins. So what is happening now is quite normal when we do not see altcoins moving simultaneously to increase simultaneously with Bitcoin in the market. Because now there are many people who prioritize Bitcoin over altcoins to get better profits at the end of the year and also the new year.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?You comparing Bitcoins with Alts? Cmon dude. Bitcoins are the master coins. People developed altcoins by seeing Bitcoins only. Now you doing the comparison of the both. Market follows Bitcoins and so do the alts. Now if we see the price, then yes Bitcoin’s price has really impressed us in the past week. If this trend is continued then definitely the price will go beyond 50k usd this month. Let’s hope for the best.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 06, 2023, 03:16:46 PMPresent, there are many altcoins in the crypto market and they have grown a lot. But it has gone down and gone again, but Bitcoin is the only currency that hasn't gone down yet, instead it's going up. I've noticed that Bitcoin has grown the most over the past couple of days, but altcoins haven't grown as much in comparison. Currently, we see Bitcoin market above $44000, I think it will bring $45000 very soon. Will Bitcoin Touch $50,000 By This December?  What do you think about the way the Bitcoin market is currently growing?Many altcoins grow fast but drop quickly unlike Bitcoin where we can see consistency in its growth (upward). Well, we can expect such a thing as the bull season is coming but after this, tragic dump is also what we experience. That is why if we want to invest in crypto for the long term, we should choose Bitcoin over altcoins but if we just aim for the short-term and enjoy the hyped, altcoins seem fit for such criteria. However, with the current situation and if the momentum keeps going, Bitcoin price could reach $50k this year. But we never know exactly what will happen a few days from now as we can't just ignore how the FUDs and negative news affect the market trend.
